contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1995 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire The best Section 3 band was: 1. Harrogate; 2. Blackpool Brass (A. Evans). The best Section 4 band was: 1. Elland Silver; 2. Gawthorpe '85 (J. Edward). Hymn-tune: Hepworth. Best basses in the march: Hepworth. Additional prizes won by Elland Silver, Reeth Brass (P. Cuff) and Muker Silver (D. Bythell). Norman Law won the award for the winning conductor.
March 21, 2011, 10:47 p.m. Oct. 16, 2013, 12:43 p.m.
1 Hepworth Band Norman Law
2 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Kevin Wadsworth
3 Elland Silver Band John Harrison
4 Harrogate Band David Lancaster Oceans
5 Blackpool Brass Alec Evans
Unknown Result Gawthorpe Brass 85 John Edward
Unknown Result Muker Silver Duncan Bytyell
Unknown Result Flookburgh Band Alan Lewis

Unknown Result Hawes Silver Stan Roocroft
